attributes.action: Allow people to choose where 10% of their taxes go from a list to improve satisfaction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give every taxpayer in Britain the opportunity to choose from a list of over 20 services or endeavours what they want at least 10% of their taxes to go to.  E.g. the NHS, forest preservation, National Trust, ombudsmen, preventing burglaries... The change in funding balances means people will get more of what they want and services will have to improve to compete for our tax. At present any tax can be spent anywhere.
